title: Triangular Bomb
description:
Da da, da da-da-da-daaa

Have you ever wondered what a traiangle bomb would look like? Well, here you go! This bomb can support up to 109 modules.

Features bomb cases of various sizes from a size of two rows (featuring 5 modules) to ten rows (featuring 109 modules)

This also includes a special casing that features 103 modules, as well as a couple of missions to complement the Centurion. More missions may be added in the future.

Thanks to ThatGuyCalledJules for creating this mod and the initial missions
Thanks to Trainzack for the scripts
Thanks to Sam for various help as well.
